item.title: Evolving Models And Games: Are We Near AGI?
item.description: ARC AGI tests true reasoning in AI, not memory. OpenAI’s o3 excelled at ARC 1, got just 3% on ARC 2, and ARC 3’s cryptic games could be the real AGI t...

item.title: Google Photos’ Elusive Tinder-Like Feature Pops Up For More Users
item.description: Google’s elusive Tinder-style swiping feature surfaces again. Does it work for you?

item.title: U.K. Backs Down Over Backdoor Access To Worldwide Apple User Data
item.description: The U.K. appears to have agreed to drop its demands for access to Apple user data currently protected by encryption.

item.title: Apple iPhone 17 Pro: Striking New Design Leaks In New Report
item.description: A new leak suggests that the material that is used in the next Pro iPhones will be a significant departure from recent years.

item.title: Retail’s AI Revolution Hinges On Consumer Trust & Data Quality
item.description: As AI continues to saturate our personal and professional lives, it’s clear that technology has evolved far beyond the realm of futuristic fantasies.
